title: Black Ice
description: When teen Sherlock and American tutor Amyus Crowe visit Sherlockâ€™s brother Mycroft in London, they expect polite lunch. Instead, Mycroft holds a knife over a dead body in a locked room. Threatened with the gallows, Mycroft needs Sherlock. The search for the truth goes from a London railway station for dead bodies to frozen Moscow.
author: Andrew  Lane
